name: vuex-action-patcher
description: Vuex - Add tools to the Action context

scripts.build:browser: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file vuex-apollo.min.js --target browser
scripts.build:es: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file vuex-apollo.esm.js --target electron
scripts.build:umd: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file vuex-apollo.umd.js --target node
scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd

author: Alan J. Fitzpatrick <alajfit@gmail.com>
